MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the CH2 postcode area of Chester, affecting properties in Devon Road, Coniston Road and the surrounding area. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of faulty equipment on the underground cable network and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by generator 1:00PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 8:55AM on 4th March 2021
